item.name: SongofAscentsSongofDegrees
item.title: Song of Ascents, Song of Degrees*

body.p: SONG OF ASCENTS, SONG OF DEGREES*
Title given to each of the Psalms from 120 to 134. Perhaps these psalms were sung by pilgrims journeying up to Jerusalem for the major feasts. See Music; Musical Instruments; Psalms, Book of.
